TextBlock.Text: FERN: We should contact Basil and verify the status of the SSPU.
TULIP: I'm unsure if the signal will travel through... But I assume it would not hurt.
TULIP: Basil! Fern, Dahila, and me are heading towards the SSPU warp.
DAHILA: The signal seems to be extremely weak. Whatever it is that you want to tell us, Im sure we could discuss it inside.
FERN: Let's get moving. We don't want to end up like our discovery scroll..
TULIP: We really need to add railings to our camp.
